resources.string: Would you like to use a template as a starting point or start from scratch?
No template could be found in the assets folder. Please try reinstalling the application.
Choose a template from the list to modify.
Do you really want to discard all changes?
Please specify a filename to use as the save location.
Do you want to delete this file? You cannot undo this action.
Feel free to skip this onboarding process if you know what you are doing!
This is the main screen of the application. You can run and edit XCFA models from here.
If you click the ? icon in the top right corner, you can get more background information on the subject of this application.
As this is your first time starting this application, you most probably don\'t have any XCFA models on your device. You can click the + icon in the bottom right corner to get started.
If you choose "Template" while creating the model, you get a list of available templates to choose from.
After you made your changes, if any, hit "Save" and give it a descriptive name.

If you have already created a model, you can get some information on it on the main screen: The status is either "OK" or "error", depending on whether it can be compiled. Global variable and thread count is also displayed here.

You can touch a model and it will take you to a screen where you can do the actual testing. Set the number of repetitions, and hit run on the top right corner. Or, if you would like to, you can modify or delete the model using the buttons in the bottom right.
